page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
OUR AREA === ==== Our area includes the villages of {Grindleford}and{Frogatt. Grindleford is a small village in the{Peak District.Derbyshire's}famous edge and scenery surrounds these villages.{Frogatt}is really just a {collection}of{houses}with no centre.On top of these edges the{moorland stretches for miles around.
GRINDLEFORD =========== In Grindleford in the {80's}they have a{carnival}annually. There are different events during the week. The first event is the{crowning}of the carnival{Princess.}We asked her what she wore,"I wore a long peach coloured dress with a lace front and bottom I also had a maroon cloak."
